text: 5.12 2 Sto 36.16, Luk 6.23, Apo 5.41, 7.52, 1 Te 2.15, Hib 11.32-38, Jem 5.10, 1 Pi 4.13 Bɨ God gos ñek agñeb bɨlel okok kɨlop, gɨ tɨmel anɨb ak nep gɨlak agak. Anɨb ak nɨbop abe gɨlaknɨŋ, tep yɨbɨl gek mɨñmɨñ awl yɨbɨl gɨnɨmɨb agak. God ne nɨbop pen dɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab, man ne alaŋ agak. Anɨb ak tep yɨbɨl gek mɨñmɨñ awl yɨbɨl gɨnɨmɨb agak.
